title: You can ukulele
creator_credit: Warren Thomas and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Deals with the introduction of ukulele tuition at East Ivanhoe Primary School. Illustrates the advantages of using the ukulele as an introductory musical instrument.
